modShortDescription: It shows 4 bars at 3 levels each (red, yellow, empty). Activates when you damage the enemy and last 5 seconds. Disappears on death.
modDescription:
It shows 4 bars at 3 levels each (red, yellow, empty). Activates when you damage the enemy and last 5 seconds. Disappears on death. It should work on every enemy, even Snufkinâ€™s [custom zombies](https://7daystodiemods.com/server-side-zombies/).

**[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/m7cloteb41a26kw/AADWDFqye5uotkmAOJOt78ZCa?dl=1)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/18240-snufkins-server-side-healthbars/).
